issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
*Android SDK* 
Android Executable  : not found
ABD Executable       : C:\android-sdk-win\platform-tools\adb.exe
SDK Path                 : C:\android-sdk-win

Android path set into Environment Variables
fields.summary: In appcelerator studio "Android Executable : not found"

Installer:  4.2.13
Core Package : 7.0.4

*Node.js*
Node.js version : 8.9.1
npm version : 5.5.1

*Titanium CLI*

node -appc version : 0.2.44

comments.body: Hello, Can you please share the "appc ti setup check" log in here? Thanks.

Run 'git help git' to display the help index.

Run 'git help <command>' to display help for specific commands.

[~rohit] You can ignore that error, the android executable was deprecated and removed from the Android SDK. We will remove that error once versions with that executable drop off our supported versions list TIMOB-24891
Based on the log, this should not prevent you from developing app with the studio. Your environment is fully setup. Are you having issue with developing? Thanks.
